column4: How does ifconfig choose adapter names?  Is there a limit of 12 adapters?
I've noticed that after 12, I start getting some funky names -- ie: eth6-eth4 Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:80:c8:3a:95:e8
ifconfig is not choosing the names, its udev. there is no limit
- Any reason why udev decided to use a name like "eth6-eth4"?
